Monster.Name: Champion
Monster.Description: Champions are mighty warriors who honed their fighting skills in wars or gladiatorial pits. To soldiers and other people who fight for a living, champions are as influential as nobles, and their presence is courted as a sign of status among rulers.

MonsterTrait.Name: Indomitable (2/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

MonsterTrait.Name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: As a bonus action, the champion can regain 20 hit points.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

MonsterAction.Name: Greatsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

MonsterAction.Name: Shortbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit:56 (1d6+2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.
